title: "The ‘Nonsense Language’ That Could Subvert Image Synthesis Moderation Systems"
excerpt: "New research from Columbia university suggests that the safeguards that prevent image synthesis models such as DALL-E 2, Imagen and Parti from being able to output damaging or controversial imagery are susceptible to a kind of adversarial attack that involves ‘made up’ words."
